meanings.definition: A group of seven people or things.
meanings.sent1: Our family reunion included a septet of cousins.
meanings.sent2: The septet of colors in the rainbow is a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent3: The septet of puppies caused chaos in the living room.
meanings.sent4: The septet of stars shone brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The septet of books on the shelf caught my eye.

meanings.definition: A musical composition for seven voices or instruments.
meanings.sent1: The orchestra performed a lovely septet at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The septet of musicians played in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent3: The septet of birds outside my window sang a melodious tune.
meanings.sent4: The septet of notes blended seamlessly in the composition.
meanings.sent5: The septet of instruments filled the room with music.
